https://friend.camp/@garbados/113653448922941579

I can't stop thinking about this post by [@garbados](https://friend.camp/@garbados). Because whenever I enter the thought excercise of [#UBI](https://gerben.dev) (something I stand behind), I keep going circles about the logistics.

Her arguments about profiteers and how in the end we should just provide food is very solid, and a nice new perspective.
